item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

modbrian:

wow vengeance your getting so pissed off over the internet when in reality your proby a 400 pound fat ass who sits at teh computer all day coding your fucking server.

Testosterone, perhaps when your IQ reaches that of room temperature you might find out what it means! Also, on a serious note: _Vengeance is not fat. ‘coding your fucking server’, well, that is something you cannot get a grasp on if you are defending the moron who cannot read a simple error.

[quote=“modbrian, post:5, topic:225728”][quote author=_Vengeance link=topic=296639.msg2384432#msg2384432 date=1218703523]
Retarded people make me angry. I should probably stay away from Moparscape, I might live a little longer.
[/quote]

if you know how to fix it why dont you tell him instead of lipping him you jackass, in detail cuz hes obviously either a new coder or just doesnt understand it[/quote]
If he was to explain it in detail the user would reply with 100 other questions, each more ignorant than the last.

@_Vengeance wrote:

  3. I don’t ‘code’, I do however, program. Also - you’re standard of programming is probably downloading a ‘source’ and modifying it slightly. This is not programming.
  4. I don’t own a server
  5. I’m not pissed off over the internet, but the failure level of this forum is not helping.
  6. That was a shitty attempt at trying to shut me down, so obviously you must be the pissed off one for being told you’re retarded.

when i started coding i would have even known how to change the exp ::master gives, but after a few days i got better cuz ppl HELPED me. and anyway when you first start coding you all dont know nothing about it, you learn
